favs.title: The Search for Detroit Planet
favs.text: Detroit Planet has been disconnected from the rest of humanity for 8 year(s) and it hides the key to fixing the peace of the nation.

battle: The local population is fighting off a invading alien species that has them out gunned but not out numbered.
but who is the enemy? There is no one to trust when the enemy could be anyone.
search: a group of explorers have come across a clue pin pointing what happened and where they might be.
and it hides the key to fixing the peace of the nation.
discovery: over 100 thousand years old. Filled with technology and history of an unknown species
full of humans who have no knowledge of Earth. Where did they come from, and how?
